mdRecord.dcterms:title: Petersburg Female College, Walnut Street, Petersburg, Va: In the month of June, 1854, forty-eight gentlemen of Petersburg and its vicinity, associated themselves together for the purpose of establishing in the city a school of the highest grade, for the education of young ladies / Communications respecting the College may be addressed to D'Arcy Paul, chairman .., December, 1854. ..
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lists the names of 8 instructors, with their credentials and course of instruction, describes boarding facilities, and gives the tuition costs.. [original]
A love poem of four verses, beginning "I wonder if she loves me," is handwritten on page [3] of the sheet. [original]
